column2: I was armed with the address and I made my way down Pulaski from the Blue Line.  It was bright
column7: walked in...and it was a dentists office.  I tried to play cool.  I told the receptionists that I was "meeting a friend."  Then I had a pretend conversation on my cell phone with my 'friend' saying that "I was at the office and she could pick me up now..what was that...oh
column9: that is fine.  I'll walk around.  I feel a little awkward waiting at this office anyway..."  And I left.  I am sure the receptionists were laughing at me.
